utterances.transcript: I-I just thought you were doing so well. I...
caption: i just thought you were doing so well

utterances.transcript: I am shocked! Shocked!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: I am shocked! Shocked!! (She storms off leaving Ross to defend himself from the angry looks from onlookers.)

utterances.transcript: It's a legitimate learning technique. Wow!
utterances.transcript_with_note: It's a legitimate learning technique. (Looking around and seeing the woman behind him glaring at him.) Wow!

utterances.transcript: By the way, the week before your wedding you may not see a lot of me.

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Cut to Phoebe's room, Phoebe has put her helmet on one of her teddy bears and is playing around with it. Ross knocks and pokes his head in the door.]

utterances.transcript: Oh, hello liar.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (seeing him) Oh, hello liar.

utterances.transcript: Look, I-I'm really sorry I let go of the bike.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (entering) Look, I-I'm really sorry I let go of the bike.

utterances.transcript: I could've been killed I hope you know!

utterances.transcript: I know. I know. But, can we please try it again? Huh? I mean, you were so close Phoebe!

utterances.transcript: Well, I would love to but...the bike got stolen and the police have no suspects.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Well, I would love to but...the bike got stolen and the police have no suspects. (Ross just happens to have his hand on a sheet that is covering something that suspiciously looks like a bike.)
caption: well i would love to but the bike got stolen and the police have no suspects

utterances.transcript: Phoebe.
caption: phoebe

utterances.transcript: What?! What the hell?!
utterances.transcript_with_note: What?! (Ross rings the bell.) What the hell?!
caption: what the hell

utterances.transcript: All right, y'know what? If you are not going to learn how to ride this bike then I'm sorry, I'm just gonna have to take it back.
caption: all right you know what if you are not going to learn how to ride this bike then i m sorry i m just gonna have to take it back

utterances.transcript: What?! Why?!
caption: what why

utterances.transcript: Because! Because, it-it-it's... It'd be like you having this guitar and-and never playing it. Okay, this guitar wants to be played! And-and this bike wants to be ridden and-and if you don't ride it you-you're-you're killing its spirit! The bike is dying.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Because! Because, it-it-it's... It'd be like you having this guitar (Points to hers) and-and never playing it. Okay, this guitar wants to be played! And-and this bike wants to be ridden and-and if you don't ride it you-you're-you're killing its spirit! (Pause) The bike is dying.

utterances.transcript: All right. If you care enough to make up that load of crap, okay.

utterances.transcript: Great! Great! You're making the bike very happy.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Great! Great! (He runs to the door.) You're making the bike very happy.

utterances.transcript: Okay Ross! Please don't die!

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Rachel's office, Tag and her are planning how to get the review back.]

utterances.transcript: Okay, I think we can get the evaluation back before they see it, but we're gonna have to get into Mr. Zelner's office. Now, he doesn't get in until 10, so he's no problem, but his assistant, Betty, she comes in early to eat her breakfast at her desk.

utterances.transcript: That's kinda sad.

utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, well Betty's kinda sad. Which is why I believe I can lure her away with these chocolates. (Holding up the box of chocolates.) Now, while I distract her, you get in the office.

utterances.transcript: Umm, no. Thanks, but I'll give these to Betty. So I read your evaluation of Tag, or to use his full name, Tag Sweetcheeks Jones. Is something going on with you two?

plots: Monica decides to get to know her neighbors better by making candy for them ; it becomes so popular that she ca n't keep up with the mob waiting outside her door for more .
Joey and people form a crowd outside of the door as Monica is making candy for everyone in her kitchen .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Central Park, Phoebe is now riding her bike with ease and stops in front of Ross. They both giggle.]
